data.text: @Gizmodo US is cutting down Covid Restrictions while hitting 50k cases daily and we are just fineâ€¦.why report on a number that A. Is most likely fake. B. .005% of our daily total?
@Gizmodo Why report this clearly fake news ? Embarrassing

@rsaalman @Gizmodo They will never tell nor will they provide truth and transparency. As a friend of mine told me once, who has worked in china for years.... "after you shake hands with them, make sure to count your fingers"

@Dexter38759538 @Gizmodo no Dexter it doesnt.
But dont believe ANYTHING you hear coming from china. they dont actually tell the truth or offer transparency so take all that with a grain of salt. I have seen pics of barbed wire camps to hold covid infected to guessing those numbers are way higher.

@Gizmodo For a country that unleashed the virus on humanity and then closed their borders and continue to crack down doesnt everyone feel like china has been duping the world for a long time? We need real leadership and what we have aint that. Not even close
@Gizmodo And still no-one died. Did they report how many died in their prison camps?

@Gizmodo Riddle me this, where Covid began, 1.4b people in high density, 111k cases. Australia, where they closed borders, locked down Melbourne for over 250 days, 95% vax rate, 26m ppl and 3.3m Covid cases. I'm sorry, that does not add up.
@Gizmodo This is Fake New They Only Created Hype once again to spread This news.
